item.description:
Hamden Sign Wave and lit. Distribution

Facebook Event page: http://www.facebook.com/events/405007322876274/

CT's primary may be over but our goal of spreading the ideas of Liberty continues. Even in the rain, last weeks sign wave in Canton went extremely well; we had thousands of cars pass by us and probably several hundred honks - more people are awake out there than we think. I have made the meeting point the nearby TD Bank because there is a free public parking lot right next door without a discernible address.

Physical location for the sign wave is the intersection of Dixwell and Whitney Ave, a link to google maps is below:

http://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a&q=Dixwell+Ave+%26+Whitney+Ave,+Hamden,+CT+06518&um=1&ie=UTF-8&hq=&hnear=0x89e7da81079f2623...

Please bring your signs, literature (we'll have plenty on hand) and unwavering enthusiasm for Liberty. We are scheduled to wave until 3pm although these sometimes run longer so if you are in the area please stop by. You can call 1-888-494-CT4L the day of the event to find our location and status. Excluding of course softball-sized hail or a tornado, the sign wave is rain or shine.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the intersection of Diwell and Whitney Ave, please call 1-888-494-CT4L if you need help finding us.
item.name: Hamden Sign Wave and lit. distribution
